chapter.text: 38|1|sadeu gyohun-eulo chungmanhan kkulan eun jinlila
38|2|geuleona bulsinjadeul-eun geomanhae hago uisim-eulo bulsinhana
38|3|hananim-eun geudeul ijeon sedaedeul-eul-eolmana manh-i myeolmangke hayeoss-eumyeo geu ttae geudeul-eun eunhyeleul guhamyeo solichyeoss euna imi sigan-i jinaga beolyeossdeo la
38|4|geudeul-ege han gyeong-gojaga ileuleoss-eul ttae bulsinjadeul-eun nollamyeo malhagil ineun geojishaneun masulsala
38|5|geuga yeoleo sindeul-eul yuilsin ha nanim-eulo mandeul-eo beolyeossdan mal-inyo sillo igeos-eun nollaun il-ila
38|6|geudeul gaunde udumeolideul-i danghwanghayeo tteonamyeo malhagil dol-aga neo huiui sindeul-eul sungbaeham-e innaehala igeos-eun sillo gyehoegdoen eotteon geos-ila
38|7|ulineun jigeumkkajiui jong-gyoeseo ileon mal-eul deul-eobon jeog-i eobs-eoss-euni igeos-eun kkumyeonaen uhwa-e bulgwahanola

38|8|uli gaundeseo geuege geu mesejileul bonaessdan mal-inyo lago malha myeo geudeul-eun hananim-ui gyesie uisim hago issdeogla ineun geudeul-i geudeul-ui uisim-eulo hananim-ui beol-eul ajig mas boji anihaessgi ttaemun-ila
38|9|animyeon geudeul-i wonhaneun daelo gwonneung-gwa suyeohasim-eulo chungmanhasin junim-ui eunhyeui bomulchang-goleul gajigo issdan mal-inyo
38|10|animyeon haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui manmul-eul geudeul-i jugwanhago iss dan mal-inyo geuleohdamyeon eotteohan bangbeob eulodeunji haneul-e oleula hala
38|11|geuleona geudeul-i yeonhabhan eotteon gundaedo geogieseo myeolmangha-eossnola
38|12|geudeul ijeon-ui seonjijadeul-eul geo yeoghan noaui baegseong-gwa adeuwa oman ham-ui ju-in palaoui baegseong-i geulaess nola
38|13|samudeuwa lusgwa supsog-ui donglyodeuldo geuleohan yeonhabgun ieossnola
38|14|geudeul jung seonjijadeul-eul geoyeoghaji anihan baegseong-i eobs-eoss-euni hana nim-ui beol-i geudeul-ege ileuge doeeoss nola
38|15|ideul-eun danji hanbeon-ui napalsolileul gidaligo issnani geugeos-i i leul ttaeneun yuyedoel su eobsnola
38|16|geudeul-eun malhagileul gyesan-ui nal-i ileugi jeon-e seodulleo beol-eul naelyeobolago hadeola
38|17|geudeul-i malhaneun geos-e innaehala geuligo hananim-ui jong-imyeo ganghan namseong-in diwis-eul sang-gihala sillo geu neun hananimkke gwiuihan jala
38|18|sillo hananim-eun sancheon-eulo hayeogeum geuwa hamkke achimgwa jeonyeog-eulo habjanghayeo hananim-eul chan-yanghala haessnola
38|19|geulihayeo moin saedeul modugageuwa hamkke hananimkke sunjong hayeossdeo la
38|20|hananim-eun geuui wang-gug-eul gangha ge hasa geuege jihyewa bunmyeonghan pandanlyeog-eul jueossnola
38|21|nonjaenghadeon muliui iyagiga geudaeege ileuleossneunyo geudeul-eun gaein-ui gidosil byeog-wilo eullagassdeola

38|22|geudeul-i dawis ap-eulo gass-eul ttaegeuga geudeul-eul dulyeowo hani geudeul-i malhagil dulyeowo masiyo jeohuineun ui gyeon-eul dallihaneun dusalam-eulo nuga jalmoshayeossseubnikka jeohuideul-eul jinlilo sseo pandanhayeo jusidoe bujeonghage ma obsigo olh-eun gillo jeohuileul indoha yeo jusoseo

38|23|ineun jeoui hyeongjelo aheun a hobmaliui yang-eul soyuhago iss-eumyeo jeoegeneun hanmali bakk-en eobs-seubnida geuleonde geuga geugeos-eul naui bohoa lae dulago malhamyeo jeoege geochin mal-eul haessseubnida

38|24|dawis-i malhagil geuga neoege dan hanmali ppun-in neoui yang-eul geuui yangttelo dula yoguhan geos-eun bunmyeonghan jalmos-ila sillo manh-eun dong-eobjadeul-i seolo-ege jalmos hanani igeos-eun mid eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun ideulkwa gatji anhnola geuleona geudeul-eun sosula daoes-eun hananimkkeseo geuleul siheomham-eul-algo junimkke buboghayeo yongseoleul gu hago hoegaehayeo hananimkkelo gwiuihayeossdeola
38|25|geulihayeo hananim-eun geu-il-e daehayeo geuleul yongseohani geuneun hana nim gakkaie ileuleo aleumdaun an sigcheoleul chaj-assdeogla

38|26|dawis-iyeo uliga neoleul jisang ui daelijaloseo dueossgeoneul salamdeul-euljinliwa jeong-uilo pangyeolhala geuligo ne ma-eum-ui yogmang-eul ttaleuji malla geugeosdeul-i neolo hayeogeum hananim-ui gil eseo beos-eonage hamae hananim-ui gil eseo banghwanghaneun jadeul-egeneun gyesanhaneun geunal-eul mang-gaghan iyulo museoun beol-i iss-eulila

38|27|hananim-i haneulgwa daejiwa geu saiui manmul-eul changjoham-eun mogjeog-i iss-eossnola geugeos-eun bulsinjadeul-ui geuleusdoen saeng-gag-eulo bulsinhaneun jadeul-egeneunbuljieug-ui beol-i iss-eulila

38|28|hananim-i mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-eul jisang-eseo haeag-eul jeo jileun jadeulcheoleom daeuhandan mal-inyo hananim-i saagham-eul meollihaneun jawasaaghan jaleul dong-ilhage dalul su issgessneunyo
38|29|yeogie hananim-i geudaeege gyesihan seongseoga issnani chugbog-eulo chungmanhasa geugeos-eulo geudeul-i malsseum-eulsuggohago geugeos-eulo salamdeul-i gyohun-eul bad-a deul-igoja ham-ila
38|30|hananim-eun dawis-ege adeullo sollomon-eul jueoss-euni geuneun hullyunghan jong-ieossdeola geulihayeo geuneun hananim-egelo gwiui hayeossdeola
38|31|ohuga doeeo geuui ap-eulo maldeul-i natana seo iss-euni anjeongha go dallim-e sinsoghaessdeola
38|32|geuga malhagil sillo naneun nauijunim-eul yeom-wonhaneun geos gat-i geugeos-eul salanghaess-euni taeyang-i bam-ui beil sog eulo sum-eul ttaekkajiyeossdeola
38|33|geuga naegelo igeos-eul gajyeo ola hadeoni baldeulgwa mogdeul-eul naelyeo chigi sijaghadeola
38|34|hananim-eun sollomon-eul siheomhayeoss euni geuui ogjwa-e han sicheleul noh go junim-ui jabileul guhayeossdeola
38|35|geuga malhagil juyeo gwan-yong-eul bepul-eo jusoseo geuligo nae da-eum-e neun oji ani hal wang-gug-eul jusoseo sillo dangsin-eun eunhyeleul bepusineun su yeojaisibnida
38|36|geuhu hananim-eun balam-eulo ha yeogeum geuege sunjongtologhani geuui myeonglyeong-e ttala geuga wonhaneun gos-eulo yusunhage heulleogadeola
38|37|satangwa mogsudeulgwa mul-e deul-eo ganeun jadeuldo geuleohge hadolog haess-eu myeo
38|38|soesaseul-e hamkke mug-yeo issneun geudeuldo geuleohge hadolog haessnani
38|39|igeos-i hananim-ui eunhyela ne ga geugeos-eulo tain-ege buyeohadeun ttoneun nega geugeos-eul bogwanhadeon gyesan-e daehayeo jilmun-eul badji anihalila
38|40|geuleohge hayeo geuneun hananim ga kkai ileumae choehuui ansigcheolo a leumdaun gos-i issdeola
38|41|hananim-ui jong yol-eul sang-gihala geuneun junimkke gang-guhagil satan-i go tong-gwa jaenan-eulo jeoleul goelobhinaida
38|42|ittae malsseum-i iss-eossnola ne bal lo ttaelila yeogie ssis-eul mulgwa masi gie kkaekkushan mul-i iss-eul geos-ila
38|43|hananim-eun geuui gajog-eul beonseongke hasa geuui suleul gobjeollo hayeoss-euni igeos-eun hananim-ui eunhyelo ihaehaneun ideul-eul wihan gyohun-ila

38|44|ne son-e handabal-ui pul-eul gaji la geuligo geugeos-eulo ttaelila geuli hadoe maengseleul kkaetteuliji malla sillo hananim-eun geuga innaeham-eulo chungmanham eul al-assnola sillo geuneun hananimkke gwiuihan hullyunghan jong-ila
38|45|hananim-ui jong abeulahamgwa i saggwa yagob-eul sang-gihala geudeul-eun gang hago siyaleul gajyeossnola
38|46|hananimkkeseo mogjeog-eul dusa geu deul-eul seontaeghayeo naese-ui mesejileul allineunde iss-eossnola
38|47|sillo geudeul-eun seontaegbad-eun hullyung han dongbanjadeullo hananim an-e iss-eoss nola
38|48|iseuma-elgwa ellisyawa julkipeul-eul sang-gihala geudeuldo seon-indeullo seon taegbad-eun ja jung-e iss-eossnola
38|49|igeos-eun hanaui gyohun-ila sil lo uiloun janeun aleumdaun choehuui geojujileul gajil geos-ila
38|50|eden-ui cheongug-i balo geudeul-eul wihae mun-eul yeol-eonohgo issnani
38|51|geudeul-eun geugos-eseo hyusig-eul chwi hamyeo pungseonghan gwailgwa dalkomhan eumlyo suleul cheonghamae
38|52|gat-eun naiui nun-eul naeligam-eun sungyeolhan yeoseongdeul-i geudeul yeop-eseo si jung-eul deunila
38|53|geuwa gat-i gyesan-ui nal-eul wihaecheongug-eun neohuiege yagsogdoen geos-ila
38|54|hananim-i neohuiege bepun il yonghal yangsig-eun sillo yeong-wonhan geos-ila
38|55|saaghan janeun choehuui ansigcheo ga jeojubad-eun gos-i doel geos-ila
38|56|geugos-eun jiog-ila geudeul-i geu gos-e ileuni geudeul-i iss-eul gos-eun jeo jubad-eun chimsang-eulo
38|57|kkeulhneun aegchewa gud-eoganeun aegche leul masbolila
38|58|geuwa yusahan tto daleun beoldeul-iissnola
38|59|yeogie neohuiwa hamkke deul-eoon han muliga issnani geudeul-eun hwan-yeongbad ji moshadoda sillo geudeul-eun buljiog eul masbolila

38|60|chujongjadeul-i geudeul-ui udumeoli deul-ege malhadoda neohuido machangaji la neohuileul wihan hwandaega eobs-eum-ila uliege i beol-i issge han geosdo neohuideul-ila ije jeojuhal gos-eun jeo jubad-eun gos-ila
38|61|juyeo jeohuiege i beol-i issgehan jadeul-egeneun jieug-ui beol-eul deoha yeo jusoseolago geudeul-i malhaja
38|62|udumeolideul-eun uliga healigon haessdeon saaghan jadeul-eul bol su eobs neun geos-eun eotteon il-inyo
38|63|uliga geudeul-eul jolonghaessgi ttae mun-inyo animyeon uliui nun-i geudeul eul boji musham-inyo
38|64|sillo geudeul-i buljiog-eseo seo lo nonjaenghandaneun jinlineun sasil-ila
38|65|illeogalodoe sillo naneun gyeong-go ja-e bulgwahamyeo hollo gyesimyeo modeun geos-eul jugwanhasineun hananim oeeneun sin-i eobsnola
38|66|hananim-eun haneulgwa daejiwa geu sai manmul-ui junim-isimyeo gwonneung-gwa gwan-yong-eulo chungmanhasin bun-isila
38|67|illeogalodoe igeos-eun gajang jung yohan gyesila
38|68|geuleonde neohuineun deung-eul dollindan mal-inyo
38|69|geudeuldo uigyeon-eul dallihaneun geos-eul naega eotteohge al-assneunyo
38|70|igeos-eun naega bunmyeonghan gyeong-goja e bulgwahadaneun gyesila
38|71|junimkkeseo cheonsadeul-ege malsseum-iiss-eossnola naega heulg-eulo ingan-eul bich eul geos-ila
38|72|naega ingan-ui hyeongsang-eul mandeul-eo geu an-e nae yeonghon-eul bulleo neoh-eulinigeuleul gyeongbaehala
38|73|modeun cheonsadeul-i dahamkke geuleoh ge hayeoss-euna
38|74|ibeulliseuneun geuleohji anihagogeomanhayeo bulsinja jung-e issge doeeoss deola

38|75|hananimkkeseo malsseumhasa ibeulliseuya mueos-i neolo hayeogeum naega naui duson-eulo changjohan geuege bubog ham-eul banghaehaneunyo neoui omanham-ingaanimyeon nega gajang wie issneun ja gaunde issneunyo
38|76|ibeulliseuga daedabhagil jega geuboda hullyungham-iyo dangsinkkeseo jeoleulmandeusim-e bul-eseo changjohayeossgo geuleulmandeung-e heulg-eseo bich-eossseubnida
38|77|hananim-i malsseumhasa igos-eseo nagala sillo neoneun jeojubad-eun jala
38|78|simpan-ui geunalkkaji naui jeoju ga neoege iss-eulila
38|79|ibeulliseuga malhagil juyeo jug eunjaga buhwaldoeneun geunalkkaji jeoleul yuyehayeo jusoseo
38|80|hananimkkeseo malsseumhasa geuleomyeon nega yuyedoenani
38|81|gyeoljeongdoen geu sigan-ui nalkkajila
38|82|ibeulliseuga malhagil dangsin-ui gwonneung-e maengsehageonde naega geudeul mo duleul yuhoghalila
38|83|geuleona dangsin-ui eunhyelo malmi am-a seongsilhan dangsin-ui jongdeul-eun je-oe la hani
38|84|hananimkkeseo malsseumhasa geugeos-eun jinliyo jinliga mueos-inji naega mal halila
38|85|neowa geuligo neoleul ttaleuneun mo dulo jiog-eul gadeug chaeulila
38|86|illeogalodoe naega igeos-eulo neohuiege eotteohan bosangdo guhaji anihamyeo nae ttohan wiseonjaga anila
38|87|igeos-eun modeun inlyuleul wihan gyohun-ila
38|88|sillo neohuineun jamsi humyeon geu modeun sasil-eul alge doelila
